titles.title: A resolution designating the week of November 19 through November 25, 2017, during which the holiday of Thanksgiving is observed, as "National Family Week".
A resolution designating the week of November 19 through November 25, 2017, during which the holiday of Thanksgiving is observed, as "National Family Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Designates the week during which Thanksgiving is observed in 2017 as National Family Week.
